title: Rum Punch for One
directions: 1Place ice cubes in tall glass. Add lime juice and sugar syrup and stir.
2Add rum and water (or passion fruit juice), and stir.
3Add bitters and nutmeg on top, and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/2 oz lime juice (fresh squeezed is best)
1 oz simple syrup (a mix of sugar and water cooked over low heat to create a syrup)
1 pinch grated nutmeg (freshly grated is best)
